title: Microsoft’s new Android division to boost Windows integrations as Google does the same with PC makers
content:
Given its lack of a first-party mobile OS, Microsoft is firmly invested in offering its services on Android, while also being an OEM with the Surface Duo. The company has now created a dedicated Android division internally.

more…

The post Microsoft’s new Android division to boost Windows integrations as Google does the same with PC makers appeared first on 9to5Google.
